nginx.description:
Open source web server for HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP, POP3, and IMAP protocols, as well as a load balancer, HTTP cache, and a reverse proxy server.

Advanced users only: You must add a default config file to your Config Storage share.

Based on the official docker image: https://hub.docker.com/_/nginx, available for amd64 architecture only.
nginx.more_info:
You must create a default config file in the Config Storage share before starting this Rockon, which you can extend with your own custom configuration.
For advanced users, an example configuration file can be found in the nginx wiki.

/etc/nginx/conf.d.description: Choose a Share for the nginx configuration. Eg: create a Share called nginx-config for this purpose alone.
/etc/nginx/conf.d.label: Config Storage

/usr/share/nginx/html.description: Choose a Share for the files that nginx will serve (HTML, JavaScript, etc.). Eg: create a share called nginx-data for this purpose alone.
/usr/share/nginx/html.label: Served Content Storage
